channel.title: Benny Hartnett - Projects & Updates
channel.description: Software Developer & AI Engineer based in Washington D.C. Metropolitan Area. Projects in generative AI, nuclear technology, IoT, and government contracting.

item.title: Uranium Enrichment Calculator
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: Built for Centrus Energy to compute feed quantity, SWU requirements, and optimum tails assay from input assays for uranium enrichment processes.
item.content:encoded:
A specialized web-based calculator built for Centrus Energy that computes:

  • Feed quantity requirements
  • SWU (Separative Work Unit) calculations
  • Optimum tails assay from input assays

Technologies: HTML, JavaScript

Customer: Centrus Energy

item.title: Edge Vehicle Make/Model Detection
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: Using NVIDIA Jetson to detect vehicle make and model at the edge with computer vision and deep learning.
item.content:encoded:
Edge computing project leveraging NVIDIA Jetson hardware for real-time vehicle identification.

Technologies: NVIDIA Jetson, Computer Vision, Deep Learning

Status: Concept

item.title: Trunk Radio Speech Intelligence
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: Converts trunk radio audio to text with speech-to-text models, uses LLM with RAG for local code definitions and jargon, generates news feed and activity map.
item.content:encoded:
Intelligent processing of emergency services radio communications:

  • Speech-to-text conversion
  • LLM with RAG for local codes and jargon
  • Automated news feed generation
  • Activity mapping with camera feed integration

Technologies: Speech-to-Text, LLM, RAG, Mapping, Camera Feeds

Status: Concept

item.title: Subterranean Autonomous Vehicle
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: Concept for an underground autonomous vehicle capable of tunnel boring, seismic surveillance, and payload delivery.
item.content:encoded:
Conceptual design for a subterranean autonomous platform with capabilities including:

  • Tunnel boring
  • Seismic surveillance
  • Payload delivery

Technologies: LIDAR, ROS, Seismic Sensors, Autonomous Navigation

Status: Concept

item.title: IoT-based Wildfire Detection System
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: Designed and developed an IoT system for real-time wildfire detection and prevention, deployed on fire towers in remote high-risk areas.
item.content:encoded:
IoT system for real-time wildfire detection and prevention:

  • Deployed on fire towers in remote high-risk areas
  • Integrated AWS S3 image storage
  • Google Maps geolocation
  • Durable waterproof enclosure

Technologies: Raspberry Pi, FLIR Thermal Camera, GSM Chip, Servo Motors, AWS S3, Google Maps

Customer: Perimeter

Status: Active

item.title: Frisbee Game in Unity
item.dc:creator: Benny Hartnett
item.description: A 3D frisbee game built using Unity targeting Oculus headsets, including 3D modeling in Trimble SketchUp.
item.content:encoded:
VR frisbee game developed for Oculus headsets:

  • Built with Unity game engine
  • 3D modeling in Trimble SketchUp
  • VR optimized controls

Technologies: C#, Oculus, Trimble SketchUp

Customer: Virginia TSA

Type: Academic
